subject: [R] About autocorrelation
body:
Hello R-users,

I'd like to know if there is an autocorrelation function for cases when the time differences between the observations vary? I want to give both the time points (x) and values (y) for the function and get as an output an estimation of autocorrelation.

Atte Tenkanen
University of Turku, Finland

______________________________________________
R-help@stat.math.ethz.ch mailing list
https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/r-help
PLEASE do read the posting guide http://www.R-project.org/posting-guide.html
and provide commented, minimal, self-contained, reproducible code.
